name: Missal of Bishop Antonio Scarampi

description: Missal of Bishop Antonio Scarampi; Fra Vincentius a Fundis (Italian, active about 1560s), and Fra Vincentius a Fundis (Italian, active about 1560s); Nola, Campania, Italy; 1567; Tempera and gold leaf on parchment bound between pasteboard covered with original brown morocco; Leaf: 41 × 27 cm (16 1/8 × 10 5/8 in.); Ms. Ludwig V 7; J.
